name: Token controls and token metrics
description: Implement usage governance for LLM APIs using token limits and token usage metrics.
recommendations: Define standard limits by consumer tier (internal apps vs partners vs external developers).
Emit token metrics to a central monitoring target to support chargeback or capacity planning.
Document fallback behavior and retries when upstream LLM endpoints are throttled.
nextSteps: Apply token-limit policies from Policies → ai-gateway (Azure OpenAI and generic LLM variants).
Apply token metric emission policies from Policies → ai-gateway and validate dashboards.
